code:
import{createReducer,combineReducers}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{getById,getAllDragons}from"./operation";var itemReducer=createReducer([],function(builder){builder.addCase(getById.fulfilled,function(_,_ref){var payload=_ref.payload;return payload;});});var allDragonsReducer=createReducer([],function(builder){builder.addCase(getAllDragons.fulfilled,function(_,_ref2){var payload=_ref2.payload;return payload;});});var loadingReducer=createReducer(false,function(builder){///GET_ITEM
builder.addCase(getById.pending,function(){return true;});builder.addCase(getById.fulfilled,function(){return false;});builder.addCase(getById.rejected,function(){return false;});///GET_All_DRAGONS
builder.addCase(getAllDragons.pending,function(){return true;});builder.addCase(getAllDragons.fulfilled,function(){return false;});builder.addCase(getAllDragons.rejected,function(){return false;});});var errorReducer=createReducer(null,function(builder){///GET_ITEM
builder.addCase(getById.pending,function(){return null;});builder.addCase(getById.rejected,function(_,_ref3){var payload=_ref3.payload;return payload;});///GET_All_DRAGONS
builder.addCase(getAllDragons.pending,function(){return null;});builder.addCase(getAllDragons.rejected,function(_,_ref4){var payload=_ref4.payload;return payload;});});var dataReducers=combineReducers({item:itemReducer,allDragons:allDragonsReducer,loading:loadingReducer,error:errorReducer});var itemsReducers=combineReducers({data:dataReducers});export default itemsReducers;
